metadata.title: Convert PNG to JPG - Free Online Image Converter | Toolaze
metadata.description: Convert PNG images to JPG format instantly. Batch convert up to 100 images. Reduce file size while maintaining quality. 100% free and private.

hero.desc: Convert PNG to JPG online for free. Simply drop your PNG images below to convert them to JPG in seconds.

intro.title: Optimize Your Images
intro.content: JPG format offers much smaller file sizes compared to PNG, making it ideal for web use and storage. Our converter maintains visual quality while dramatically reducing file size.

scenes.title: Web Optimization
scenes.desc: Convert PNG to JPG for faster website loading.

scenes.title: Storage Savings
scenes.desc: Reduce storage space by converting PNG to JPG.

faq.a: No, JPG doesn't support transparency. The transparent areas will become white.

faq.q: How much smaller will files be?
faq.a: JPG files are typically 50-80% smaller than PNG files.
